channel.title: Analog Hole Gaming
channel.itunes:author: Chris Mike and Christy
channel.itunes:summary: You've fallen into the Analog Hole. Join Chris, Mike and Christy as they talk about the latest gaming news. From hardware to software, they rant about all aspects of modern video games.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A gaming discussion podcast.

item.title: Analog Hole Episode 266 - 8/4/14
item.description:
Had some issues with Thay's audio this episode, thus leading to a several week delay in getting the show out. Fortunately, Thay seems to have disappeared, so we haven't recorded anything new either.

Speaking of which, has anyone seen Thay recently? I haven't seen him in a while. If you bump into him online, tell him we need to record.
item.itunes:subtitle: Wherefor art thou, Thay?
